Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes the emergency water infrastructure repairs fund
Summary: Establishes the emergency water infrastructure repairs fund; provides funding to municipalities for the emergency repair of any municipal water infrastructure.
LawCode: Add ยง1285-v, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the emergency water infrastructure repairs fund; and making an appropriation therefor
